property.name: showFlowInModal
property.label: Show Flow in Modal
property.description: When true flow will launch in modal window

property.name: flowInputVariableName
property.label: Subflow Input Variable Name
property.description: If passing a variable to subflow enter the variable name here i.e. recordId

property.name: flowInputValue
property.label: Subflow Input Value
property.description: If your subflow has a string input you can pass a value to that variable from your main flow

property.name: flowInputVariablesJSON
property.label: Subflow Input Variables JSON
property.description: Example: [{"name":"stringVar","type":"String","value":"0018c000029c8kpAAA"},{"name":"numVar","type":"Number","value":47}] - See https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/platform/lwc/guide/use-flow-embed-input-variables-example.html for more information on how to format the inputs.

property.name: buttonVariant
property.label: Button Variant
property.description: The variant for your button i.e. brand default is neutral

property.name: stretchButton
property.label: Stretch Button
property.description: When true the button stretches the container width

property.name: iconPosition
property.label: Icon Position
property.description: Left or Right sets your icon position

property.name: buttonPadding
property.label: Button Padding
property.description: Sets button padding using slds styling default is slds-p-around_small

property.name: isDisableClose
property.label: Disable Close Icon
property.description: If true, don't allow the user to close the flow modal with the X button or the ESC key. (Default = false)

property.name: hideButton
property.label: Hide Launch Button
property.description: If true, hide the launch button and reactively launch the flow when the Subflow Input Value or the Subflow Input Variables JSON change. (Default = false)

property.name: modalSize
property.label: Modal Size
property.description: small, medium, large, or full (default = large)
